verifying.title: Verifying your email...
verifying.description: Please wait while we verify your email address.

success.title: Email verified successfully!
success.description: Your email has been verified. You will be redirected shortly.

error.missingParams: Invalid verification link. Please try signing in again.
error.verificationFailed: Email verification failed. Please try again.
error.invalidToken: Invalid verification token. Please request a new magic link.
error.tokenExpired: Verification token has expired. Please request a new magic link.
error.contactSupport: If this problem persists, please contact support.

onboarding.heading: Complete Your Profile
onboarding.title: Welcome! Let's set up your profile
onboarding.description: Please provide your name to complete your account setup.

profileImage.label: Profile Photo (Optional)
profileImage.description: Add a profile photo to personalize your account

verifyOtp.heading: One Time Password
verifyOtp.title: Verify your One Time Password
verifyOtp.description: We've sent a one time password to your email address.

expired.heading: Verification token expired
expired.description: Please press resend to receive a new token.

error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
error.verificationFailed: Email verification failed. Please try again
error.signinError: Sign in failed. Please try again

successDialog.heading: Login successful
successDialog.title: Welcome to the club!
successDialog.subtitle: You are now logged in. You can now close this modal and continue.

success.title: Welcome to the club!
success.subtitle: Your account has been created and you are now logged in. You can now close this modal and continue.

successDialog.heading: Sign up successful
successDialog.title: Welcome to the club!
successDialog.subtitle: Your account has been created and you are now logged in. You can now close this modal and continue.

error.minlength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
error.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
error.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
error.digit: Password must contain at least one number

error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please contact customer support.
error.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

common.livingRoomAmount: {amount, plural, =1 {1 living room} other {# living rooms}}

noResults.text: You don't have any bookings yet. When you request a booking, it will appear here.

bookingRequest.subject: Booking request
bookingRequest.body: A new booking request has been made for your property.
bookingRequest.heading: Booking request
bookingRequest.description: Your booking request for {propertyName} has been sent to the host. The host will review your booking request and get back to you as soon as possible.

whatsNext.heading: What's next?
whatsNext.description: You can check the status of your booking at any time in your {bookingsPage} page.

step1.title: The host of the property will review your booking request
step1.description: In order to accept your booking request, the host will need to review your request and confirm the booking.

step2.title: The host accepts your booking
step2.description: Once the host accepts your booking, you will receive a confirmation email and you can start preparing for your stay.

step3.title: After the host has accepted your booking
step3.description: When your booking is confirmed, you can communicate with the host by clicking on your booking and using the chat.

bookingApproval.subject: Booking approval
bookingApproval.previewText: Your booking has been approved by {hostName}!
bookingApproval.body: Your booking has been approved by the host.
bookingApproval.heading: Booking approved!
bookingApproval.description: Your booking for {propertyName} has been approved by the host. You can now communicate with the host by clicking the booking and using the chat.

noResults.text: You haven't added any properties to your favorites yet. When you add a property to your favorites, it will appear here.
You don't have any properties yet. When you add a property, it will appear here.
You don't have any bookings yet. When a guest requests a booking, it will appear here.

approveDialog.heading: Confirm booking
approveDialog.description: Are you sure you want to approve this booking?

bookingRequest.subject: Booking request
bookingRequest.body: A new booking request has been made for your property.
bookingRequest.heading: Booking request by
bookingRequest.description: A new booking request has been made for {propertyName}. The guest has received a confirmation email of their booking request. Until that time the booking is pending. We kindly ask you to review the booking request within 48 hours or we will automatically accept it..

whatsNext.heading: What's next?
whatsNext.description: You can check the status of your booking at any time in your {bookingsPage} page.

step1.title: You will need to review the booking request
step1.description: In order to accept your booking request, you will need to review the booking request and confirm the booking.

step2.title: When you accept the booking
step2.description: Once you accepts the booking, you can communicate with the guest by clicking the booking and using the chat.

bookingApproval.subject: Booking approval
bookingApproval.body: Your booking has been approved by the host.
bookingApproval.heading: Booking approved!
bookingApproval.description: You approved a booking for {propertyName}. The guest has received a confirmation email of their approved booking. You can now communicate with the guest by clicking the booking and using the chat.

heading.title: Select the amenities of your property
heading.subtitle: This will determine the comfort level for your guests.

heading.title: Describe your place
heading.subtitle: Add a description of your property to help guests find it.

heading.title: Share some basics about your place
heading.subtitle: You'll add more details later, like bed types.

heading.title: How many guests and what type of guests can stay?
heading.subtitle: When guests reserve your property, they cannot exceed this number.

heading.title: Where's your place located?
heading.subtitle: Your address is only shared with guests after they've made a booking.

heading.title: Describe the neighborhood
heading.subtitle: Add a description of the neighborhood to help guests find things to do in the area.

heading.title: Add images
heading.subtitle: Add at least {minImagesAmount} images to your property to help guests find it.

roomDialog.heading: What type of room is this?
roomDialog.subtitle: By assigning a room type your guests can get a better view of your property.

heading.title: Set your price
heading.subtitle: Set a price for your property. Remember to stay competitive for your property to be successful.

heading.title: What type of place will guests have?
Which of these best describes your place?
Give your property a title
heading.subtitle: With a proper title, your property will be more visible to guests.

dates.heading: Plan your stay
dates.selectDates: Add dates to view the prices

bottomBar.selectDates: Select dates to view the prices

legal-name.label: Legal name
legal-name.formIntro: Please fill in your legal name. This is the same name as stated in your passport or ID card.

dialog.subtitle: Select the dates for your stay.
Select the dates for your stay.

children.label: Children
children.notAllowed: The host does not allow children

infants.label: Baby
infants.notAllowed: The host does not allow infants

pets.label: Pets
pets.notAllowed: The host does not allow pets

loginDialog.heading: Login to book this property
loginDialog.subtitle: You need to be logged in to place a booking. If you don't have an account, you can create one by <link>signing up</link>.

loginSuccessDialog.heading: Login successful
loginSuccessDialog.title: Welcome to the club!
loginSuccessDialog.subtitle: You are now logged in. You can now close this modal and continue.

signUpDialog.heading: Sign up to book this property
signUpDialog.subtitle: You need to have an account to place a booking. If you already have an account, you can book by <link>logging in</link>.

signUpSuccessDialog.heading: Sign up successful
signUpSuccessDialog.title: Welcome to the club!
signUpSuccessDialog.subtitle: Your account has been created and you are now logged in. You can now close this modal and continue.

successDialog.heading: Booking request sent
successDialog.title: Booking request successful
successDialog.subtitle: Your booking request has been sent to the host. The host will review your request and get back to you within 48 hours.

hostSelfDialog.heading: Booking not allowed
hostSelfDialog.title: You are the host of this property
hostSelfDialog.subtitle: You are not allowed to request a booking for your own property.
